name: cached-middleware-fetch-next
description: A Next.js fetch wrapper for edge middleware that uses Vercel Runtime Cache as its caching backend

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push origin main --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push origin main --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push origin main --tags
scripts.release:prerelease: npm version prerelease && git push origin main --tags
scripts.test: npm run type-check && npm run build
